channel.title: Misc on Jincheng Li
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Jincheng Li

item.title: Why This Blog
item.description: I originally started this blog as a graduate student while I was at Columbia, in the hopes of putting my spare time to better use. Now it’s just a reason for me to do some research into things I never dedicate enough time to understand, and hopefully benefit whoever happens to read it. This site uses Hugo. The theme is Hugo Xmin.
